summary: A sex and drug addicted young man who is forced into a Christian-run ministry in an attempt to cure him of his "gay affliction", where instead he is faced with the truth in his heart and spirit.
cast: Jeremy Glazer|Chad Allen|David Petruzzi|Arron Shiver|Colin Jones|Stephen Lang|Judith Light|William Dennis Hurley|Robert Gant|Robert Baker|Ross Kelly|Luce Rains|Paul Scallan|Carmen Morales|Forrest Fyre|Greg Serano|Marc Miles|Kevin Wiggins|Mary Evans|Hunter Krestan|Carmen Serano|Sam Gill|Brent Lambert|Paul Daniel McGowen
title: Save Me
